text: لَيۡسَ لَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَمۡرِ شَيۡءٌ أَوۡ يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَوۡ يُعَذِّبَهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ

translation.en: Not for you, [O Muhammad, but for Allah], is the decision whether He should [cut them down] or forgive them or punish them, for indeed, they are wrongdoers
translation.id: Itu bukan menjadi urusanmu (Muhammad)143) apakah Allah menerima tobat mereka, atau mengazabnya, karena sesungguhnya mereka orang-orang zalim
